original_title: 遠距離恋愛中の彼女がいるのに、憧れの女上司とセックスに溺れてしまった。
overview: I was cheating on my boyfriend. He was desperate and went out drinking with his subordinate Yuki at the end of work. He wasn't strong, but he drank too much. I couldn't walk properly, so I came to the hotel while being held by Yuki. I'm lonely and I don't want to be alone ... I invited Yuki a little forcibly. She knew she was in a long-distance relationship.
title: Cheating On My Long Distance Girlfriend With My Hot Boss, Starring Airi Kijima
